problem_text:
A group G is saturated with groups from a class X if every finite subgroup K ⩽ G is contained in a subgroup L ⩽ G isomorphic to some group from X. Is it true that a periodic group saturated with finite simple groups of Lie type of uniformly bounded ranks is itself a simple group of Lie type of finite rank?
A. K. Shl¨epkin
